import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { TodoItem } from "../todoitem"; import { Model } from '../model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todo', templateUrl: './todo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todo.component.css'] }) export class TodoComponent { constructor(){} model = new Model(); getName(){ return this.model.name; } }
